p: Respiration rate was increased on the second day with the application of EO+AA, EO+Chitosan, and AA in comparison to the control treatment ( Figure 2B). Chitosan application resulted in lower respiration rate on the fourth day in comparison to the control treatment and the combinations of EO+AA and Chitosan+AA. Following that an increased respiration rate was also observed on the sixth day with the combination of Chitosan+AA that revealed the highest value compared to all treatments.
